name: Car Jam at the Border
description:
Car jam at the border is a hyper casual endless runner car game set on the chile/argentina border after a snowfall where your only mission is to choose a car and drive through an endless truck traffic jam without being hit.

 • infinite • hyper casual • car game • selection of skins • up down scroller.

mountains, truk, nature, infinite, truks, scroll, cold, speed, skins, cars, blue, car, snow, casual, updown, hyper
